article:
The following is a 'list of kings and queens of Main Dynasties of Greater Iran',
which includes all of the 'empires' ruling over geographical Greater Iran and
their rulers. For more comprehensive lists of kings, queens, sub-kings and sub-
queens of Iran please see: *List of rulers of Pre-Achaemenid kingdoms of Iran
*List of rulers of Elam *List of rulers of Parthian sub-kingdoms *Muslim
dynasties of Iran
headings: Afsharid dynasty <ref>The Cambridge History of Iran, vol. 7, 1991, p. 960.</ref> (1736–1796)
Zand dynasty<ref>The Cambridge History of Iran, vol. 7, 1991, p. 961.</ref> (1751–1794)
Qajar dynasty<ref>The Cambridge History of Iran, vol. 7, 1991, p. 962.</ref> (1794–1925)
